chunk:
Zum Face Nourishing Facial Oil

Brand: Zum

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: LIMNANTHES ALBA (MEADOWFOAM) SEED OIL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER) EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL (FRACTIONATED), ROSA CANINA* (ROSEHIP OIL), ESSENTIAL OILS, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E), AND JASMINUM GRANDIFLORUM (JASMINE ABSOLUTE).
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
